quagga.input.subject: RE: Luntz Presentation
quagga.input.xto: Mark Palmer, Steven J Kean, Richard Shapiro
quagga.input.body:
FYI.
---------------------- Forwarded by James D Steffes/HOU/EES on 09/14/2000 
11:39 AM ---------------------------


"Elizabeth A. VanDersarl" <liz@luntz.com> on 09/14/2000 10:50:27 AM
To: "'James D Steffes'" <jsteffe@enron.com>
cc:  
Subject: RE: Luntz Presentation


Hi Jim,

 I apologize for not sending these to you earlier.  Please call me if
you have any problems with this transmission.

Regards,
Liz


 - Perfect soundbite.doc
 - PRINCIPLES.doc
 - Top Facts.doc
 - YOUR OPPONENT.doc
 - Pro-Dereg - revised.doc
